Everybody wants the golden egg "FTE" role so they won't make any waves to solve any problems you have. All of the administration staff for your contracting agency just wants to get promoted to FTE so they don't fix anything for fear of being a "problem" and all of your Facebook Managers are at the lowest level of FTE and they just want to get promoted to a better role so THEY won't fix anything for you. Facebook encouraged people to refer their friends, but at one point, over 20 people worked there connected all to the same group of friends which led to bullying, harassment, trolling, and all types of horrible behavior in the workplace - it became a mob.
